ya10.3.3:5.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti?
ya10.3.3:6.1: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti.
ya10.3.3:6.2: Pañca puggalā cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti.
ya10.3.3:7.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissatīti?
ya10.3.3:8.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:9.1: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:9.2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:10.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissatīti?
ya10.3.3:11.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:12.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissatīti?
ya10.3.3:13.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.3:14.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissatīti?
ya10.3.3:15.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ parijānissati.
ya10.3.3:15.2: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti cakkhundriyañca parijānissanti.
ya10.3.3:16.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:17.1: Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:17.2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyañca pajahissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:18.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti?
ya10.3.3:19.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:20.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti?
ya10.3.3:21.1: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti, pañca puggalā aññindriyañca bhavissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti.
ya10.3.3:22.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.3:23.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti?
ya10.3.3:24.1: Tayo puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahissanti.
ya10.3.3:24.2: Pañca puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca pajahissanti.
ya10.3.3:25.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:26.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:27.1: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:27.2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:28.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.3:29.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:30.1: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:30.2: Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:31.1: ⇒ Yo aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.3:32.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:33.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati.
ya10.3.3:33.2: Satta puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti aññindriyañca bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:35.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissatīti?
ya10.3.3:36.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissatīti?
ya10.3.3:37.1: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissanti, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissanti.
ya10.3.3:37.2: Tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānissanti.
ya10.3.3:38.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:39.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissatīti.
ya10.3.3:40.1: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissanti.
ya10.3.3:40.2: Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānissanti.
ya10.3.3:41.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:42.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissatīti?
ya10.3.3:43.1: ⇒ Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissati so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.3:44.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissati, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati.
ya10.3.3:44.2: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānissanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.3:45.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānissatīti?
ya10.3.3:46.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:47.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissatīti?
ya10.3.3:48.1: Cattāro puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissanti.
ya10.3.3:48.2: Pañca puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti.
ya10.3.3:49.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:50.1: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissanti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:50.2: Tayo puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:51.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissatīti?
ya10.3.3:52.1: ⇒ Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.3:53.1: Tayo puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissanti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.3:53.2: Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.3:54.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissatīti?
ya10.3.3:55.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:56.1: Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:56.2: Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.3:57.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:58.1: ⇒ Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.3:59.1: Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.3:59.2: Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.3:60.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.3:61.1: ⇒ Yo aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.3:62.1: Aggamaggasamaṅgī aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati.
ya10.3.3:62.2: Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.3:63.1: ⇐ Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
